critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: Sidebar.js useEffect had mobileOpen in dependency array causing immediate state reset. Changed from useEffect with mobileOpen dependency to simple route-change-only effect.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile responsive features are now fully working after fixing Sidebar.js. The fix was changing the useEffect dependency array from [location.pathname, mobileOpen] to just [location.pathname] to prevent the sidebar from immediately closing when opened. The 422 error on /api/airtable/mail endpoint is a pre-existing backend issue unrelated to this refactoring. All navigation, sidebar modals, and responsive behaviors work correctly across mobile (375px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1920px) viewports.
